name: vstatus
description: Generates a image file containing the information like, what workspace the user is on, what file is he editing and since how long and so on.

commands.title: Check vstatus running fine or no.

vstatus.interval.description: The interval for how frequently the extension extracts workspace information, in seconds. For example, if set to 10, the extension will retrieve workspace data every 10 seconds.

vstatus.serverPort.description: The port number on which the HTTP server for the VStatus extension will listen (To serve the image file). Specify a unique port number to avoid conflicts with other services.

enumDescriptions: Image will be generated with dark theme
Image will be generated with light theme
vstatus.theme.description: The images which will be generated will have specefied theme.

enumDescriptions: Track time by the file being edited
Track time by the workspace being opened
vstatus.trackTimeBy.description: Choose how to track time. 'file' tracks time based on the file being edited, while 'workspace' tracks time based on the workspace being opened.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
